inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getExport.

name.description: Name of the export as it appears in the console or from [list-exports](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/cloudformation/list-exports.html)

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getExport.

exportingStackId.description: ARN of stack that contains the exported output name and value.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

value.description: Value from Cloudformation export identified by the export name found from [list-exports](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/cloudformation/list-exports.html)
